page.title: 04 Childrens Catching Games
page.content: {CHAIN TIG-}One person is'it'.If caught you link on their arm and try to catch the others.When four are caught they divide into twos until all are caught. The first person caught is now 'it'. {STICK IN THE MUD -}Play it with seven or more people.One person is 'it'.He has to try to catch all the others.If one is caught they stand still with their legs open as if they were "stuck in the mud".They go free if someone crawls through their legs.If they are caught three times they will be 'it'. {HUNT-}Two equal teams,one team thinks up a word-each person gets a letter. This team runs away and the others catch them and try to make them give their letter.When everyone is caught they jumble up the letters and try to find the word.
